item.name: Filter
item.description:
### The filter API provides two main methods

1.  **Filter** - filters based on query.
2.  **Exclude -** same as filter but excludes items based on the query, to use it you need to use the "**exclude_**" prefix before the query, e.g. _"exclude_exact"_.
    

### Queries and types

Supported data type for all queries (except any) str.

1.  **exact -** exact match (for each field)
2.  **from -** starting from (for id and create fields)
3.  **until -** ending with (for id and create fields)
4.  **like -** can include case-insensitive (for all fields except id and create)
5.  **any -** any of the list (all fields except id and create) supported data type list \[\]
6.  _**start**_ _\- start with (everything except id and created)_ case-insensitive
7.  **end** - end with (everything except id and created) case-insensitive
    

Input for Id field must not contain letters.
